Posts.EditableText: I am trying to upload a game I created using Quest 5.3.  I have been able to do this previously, but now I get an error "404 - File or directory not found", which doesn't make much sense.  My .quest file is 33MB.  Not sure if there is a limit.  Thanks for any suggestions!
Posts.HTML: I am trying to upload a game I created using Quest 5.3.  I have been able to do this previously, but now I get an error "404 - File or directory not found", which doesn't make much sense.  My .quest file is 33MB.  Not sure if there is a limit.  Thanks for any suggestions!

Posts.EditableText: Try updating to Quest 5.4. You may need to go through your code and fix some things that have changed with the updates though.
Posts.HTML: Try updating to Quest 5.4. You may need to go through your code and fix some things that have changed with the updates though.

Posts.EditableText: Updating to Quest 5.4 is unlikely to fix the upload error. Best thing to do is email me details about the error (which dorkyrooster has done) and I'll take a look (which I haven't done yet)
Posts.HTML: Updating to Quest 5.4 is unlikely to fix the upload error. Best thing to do is email me details about the error (which dorkyrooster has done) and I'll take a look (which I haven't done yet)
